d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d / s <= t:  # 到達できるかどうか
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    d, t, s = line.split()
    d = int(d)
    t = int(t)
    s = int(s)
    if (d / s) <= t:  # 分母为0时，会抛出异常
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
  line = sys.stdin.readline()
  d, t, s = line.split()
  d = int(d)
  t = int(t)
  s = int(s)
  if (d / s) <= t:
    print("Yes")
  else:
    print("No")
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d / s <= t:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
